commit message:
Update local position in config whenever we were syncing the position remotely

(Fixes bug where Nook would sometimes forget local position if app/device cycled off/on and sync server was not available.)

Pad title seekbar slightly at left and right ends
(Makes barely noticeable difference on ICS, but makes seeking to 0% much easier on pre-ICS devices)
Work-around for page-number calculation. Fixes #268 (Kind of)
